To accomplish the purpose of Clean and Green UVCE, a student led initiative,"Go Green and Clean Club"which is simply known as G2C2 was started in the year 2014 by a group of ME CSE department students. It is now run by enthusiasts from 2nd and 3rd year BE students. Presently it has about 100 voluntary members who are dedicated towards the cause.

Club aims to involve college faculty, alumni and larger number of students in future days to improve its effectiveness.
